message:
## VERIFIED (done, tested, confirmed working)

## MERGED BUT UNTESTED (code is on master, not yet tested in running app)
- Brain wiring (86de364): auto-win disabled, surprise storage wired, learned rules in retrieval, deliberation verify exit(2)
  - Test: store a pain memory, check activity.json for brain_prediction. If surprise detected, check memories.json for new 'surprise' tagged memory.
  - Test: run hw_retrieve_memories with tags matching learned-rules.json. Output should include LEARNED RULES section.
  - Test: mark a task done. NO "Completed: X" win memory should appear in memories.json.
- Bible view (6ffc007): ClaudeMdView.tsx + get_claude_md Rust command, key B, Sidebar entry, edit intent feature
  - Test: restart app, press B. Should see CLAUDE.md rendered as styled collapsible cards with icons.
  - Test: click pencil icon on a section, type instruction, should switch to terminal and send message.
- Skill memory type (fe7af58): 'skill' added to MemoryType, cyan badge in MemoryView, 90-day decay half-life
  - Test: hw_store_memory with type:'skill'. Should appear in Memory view with cyan badge.

## VERIFICATION CHECKLIST
1. `git log --oneline -5` -> expect: fe7af58, 6ffc007, 86de364
2. Restart app -> press B -> expect: styled CLAUDE.md viewer
3. `npm run build:ts` -> expect: 0 errors
4. hw_store_memory type:skill title:"Test skill" -> should succeed

## WHAT NEEDS WORK NEXT
1. Process 2 unread direction notes (autonomy directive + archive rule)
2. Clean up bible-rust worktree
3. Test all 3 features in running app after restart
4. Add restart urgency levels to handoff format (soft/mild/urgent)
